Readme:

1. After downloading an unzipping, the data was:
  a. read
	b. training and test data were merged
	c. labels were re-named
	d. variable names were made self-explanatory
		-> ^t was changes to time, for example
		
2. Using this temporary data set, a second data set was created using the plyr-library.
	This was done by using the aggregate functions and the writing everything to the text-file "tidydata".
	
3. A code book was manually produced.
